casebody.data:
NEW YORK, NEW HAVEN & HARTFORD RAILROAD COMPANY, Libelant-Appellant, v. UNITED STATES of America, Respondent-Appellee. UNITED STATES of America, Cross-Libelant Appellee, v. NEW YORK, NEW HAVEN & HARTFORD RAILROAD COMPANY, Cross-Respondent Appellant. Nos. 65, 66. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Nov. 16, 1931. Haight, Smith, Griffin & Deming, of New York City (Henry M. Hewitt and Leonard J. Matteson, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Howard W. Ameli, U. S. Atty., of Brooklyn, N. Y. (Charles E. Wythe, Sp. Asst. U. S. Atty., of New York City, of counsel), for the United States.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decrees affirmed.
